effect: Sets Psychic Terrain on switch-in, lasting 5 turns. Boosts Psychic-type moves by 30% and prevents priority moves from affecting grounded Pokémon.
synergies: Fast Psychic-type attackers (e.g., Tapu Lele, Alakazam)
Pokémon with Expanding Force for spread damage in terrain
notes: Terrain overrides other terrains. Does not affect airborne Pokémon or Pokémon with Mold Breaker/Teravolt/Turboblaze.
